meanings.definition: Relating to the study of earthquakes.
meanings.sent1: The seismological research team analyzed the earthquake data.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use seismological tools to monitor seismic activity.
meanings.sent3: The seismological experts had a 'shake-up' party to celebrate their findings.
meanings.sent4: Her seismological insights shook the foundation of earthquake research.
meanings.sent5: The seismological report painted a vivid picture of the earthquake's impact.

meanings.definition: Involving the scientific study of seismic activity.
meanings.sent1: The seismological equipment detected subtle seismic movements.
meanings.sent2: The seismological study revealed patterns in earthquake occurrences.
meanings.sent3: The seismological conference had a 'rocking' theme to match its subject.
meanings.sent4: His seismological approach to data analysis was groundbreaking.
meanings.sent5: The seismological expedition uncovered hidden secrets of seismic behavior.
